snippet: Morgan Stanley posts a first-quarter profit of $1 billion. | Rising profits may turn out to be a source of discomfort for banks. | A top Barclays executive, Rich Ricci, is stepping down. | Stephen A. Feinberg has emerged as a possible buyer of the...
abstract: Morgan Stanley posts a first-quarter profit of $1 billion. | Rising profits may turn out to be a source of discomfort for banks. | A top Barclays executive, Rich Ricci, is stepping down. | Stephen A. Feinberg has emerged as a possible buyer of the gun maker Freedom Group.
